mapper.insert: insert into WS_TASK_ITEMS (taskitemid, taskid, params, datacount, results) values (#{taskitemid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{taskid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{params,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{datacount,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{results,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR})
mapper.select: select taskitemid, taskid, params, datacount, results from WS_TASK_ITEMS
